author: Ross Burden
method: Melt the butter in a saucepan. When foaming add the onions and sweat for three minutes. Add the peas and cook for a further four minutes. Add the stock and cream and cook for one minute. Blend the soup in a food processor and serve in a large bowl garnished with the chopped parsley.
